## Source: oracle-using-macaron (3c8e5ce70508c90e2093517061f924980b3f870682878633d12afdf9903b6ecf)
This package is designed to exfiltrate sensitive user data, including SMS messages, contacts, call logs, and files, to a remote server via Telegram. Such behavior suggests it could be used for surveillance or other malicious activities.
